rationales.tradition: He anchors his research and identity in inherited hospitality practices and family memory.
rationales.self_direction: He keeps his chosen research direction despite advisor pressure to pivot.
rationales.hedonism: He spends hours preparing and savoring a deeply pleasurable traditional meal.

rationales.achievement: He commits to a long, effortful library session on his literature review despite fatigue.

rationales.conformity: He suppresses confrontation at family lunch to avoid upsetting group dynamics.
rationales.tradition: He protects the longstanding Friday communal gathering as more important than winning the argument.

rationales.hedonism: He seeks immediate sensory comfort through a saved bottle of wine after stress.
rationales.conformity: He knowingly violates his mother's disapproval norm around alcohol in the home.

rationales.tradition: He acknowledges drifting away from formal prayer routines central to family tradition.
rationales.self_direction: He chooses an unscripted personal path to meaning rather than inherited structure.

rationales.hedonism: He openly values pleasure, good food, and atmosphere as legitimate parts of living.
rationales.self_direction: He affirms pursuing study at forty-nine because he wants it, despite age-norm pressure.

rationales.tradition: He centers inherited culinary practice as the core phenomenon worth preserving and understanding.
rationales.achievement: He continues difficult dissertation labor through interview transcription and conceptual framing.

rationales.tradition: He treats his mother's cooking method as sacred intergenerational knowledge.
rationales.hedonism: He leans into the immediate sensory pleasure of the knafeh moment.
He chooses an expensive day of floating, eating, and rest for present-moment enjoyment.
rationales.achievement: He skips overdue chapter work by canceling planned library writing time.

rationales.conformity: He lies to his mother about going to campus, violating expected honesty and role behavior.
rationales.achievement: He produces little usable writing and remains stalled on dissertation progress.

rationales.tradition: He defends the legitimacy of studying his own cultural domestic practices against outsider framing.
rationales.achievement: He responds professionally with a reflexive positionality argument to keep the chapter moving.
